event.title: was taken into emergency mental health custody Friday afternoon

data.event: A Huntsville man was taken into emergency mental health custody Friday afternoon after a three-hour standoff with police in a residential neighborhood.

event.title: received a 911 call from a residence in the 1300

data.event: Walker County dispatchers received a 911 call from a residence in the 1300 block of Avenue Q in Huntsville reporting a suicidal person.
He was just in a very bad place today, and he knows he needs to get some help.‚Äù
